en-US.noUIController: This controller does not include a UI.
en-US.shouldEnableUIFirst: UI needs to be displayed to change its settings.
en-US.showIdleImage: This image will be displayed when no video is playing.
en-US.disableUIDistanceDesc: Prevents beams from extending beyond a certain number of meters.
en-US.selectDefaultVideoPlayerType: Select the default video player engine.
en-US.title: Title
en-US.playInRandomOrder: Tracks will play in random order.
en-US.playTrackAfterSeconds: Next track will play after {0} seconds.
en-US.disableSmallerThen0: If a value of 0 or less is specified, autoplay will be disabled.
en-US.ownerPermission: Has full permissions, this permission cannot be changed.
en-US.adminPermission: Can control the video player and edit user permissions.
en-US.editorPermission: Can control the video player such as play and pause.
en-US.grantInstanceOwnerDesc: Grants owner permissions to the instance owner.
en-US.grantInstanceMasterDesc: Grants owner permissions to the instance master.
en-US.autoUpdateToLatestVersion: Automatically updates to the latest version.
en-US.newVersionUpdateConfirm: A new update is available: v{0}, would you like to update?
en-US.youUseNewest: You are using the latest version.
en-US.onlyWorksOnVCCProject: The update feature only works in VCC environments.
en-US.importFromPlayer: Drag and drop a playlist from USharpVideo, IwaSync3, VizVid or Kinel to import here
en-US.getPlaylistPleaseWhit: Please wait while the playlist is being retrieved.
en-US.useLTCGIDesc: Use LTCGI for this video player
en-US.setUpLTCGIFailed: LTCGI automatic setup failed, please check if the LTCGI package is corrupted.
en-US.ltcgiSetOnOtherPlayer: LTCGI is set on another video player
en-US.clearLTCGISettings: Setting LTCGI on this player will clear LTCGI settings on other video players.
en-US.setUpAudioLinkConfirm: Do you want to automatically set up AudioLink?
en-US.setUpAudioLinkFailed: Audio Link automatic setup failed, please check if the Audio Link package is corrupted.
en-US.updateYtdlpMessage: Do you want to update to the latest version of yt-dlp?
en-US.downloadYtdlpMessage: Do you want to download yt-dlp?
en-US.playlistUrlCannotBeNullOrEmpty: Playlist URL cannot be null or empty.
en-US.ytdlpNotAvailable: yt-dlp is not available. Unable to retrieve playlist.
en-US.failedToSetExecutablePermissionsButDownl: Failed to set executable permissions but download completed.
en-US.exceptionOccurredWhileDownloadingYtdlp: An exception occurred while downloading yt-dlp.
en-US.exceptionOccurredWhileExtractingPlaylist: An exception occurred while extracting playlist.

zh-CN.shouldEnableUIFirst: 需要显示UI才能更改设置。
zh-CN.showIdleImage: 视频未播放时显示此图像。
zh-CN.disableUIDistanceDesc: 超过一定的米数之后不显示射线。
zh-CN.selectDefaultVideoPlayerType: 选择默认的视频播放器引擎。
zh-CN.title: 标题
zh-CN.playTrackAfterSeconds: 下一首曲目将在{0}秒后播放。
zh-CN.disableSmallerThen0: 如果指定值小于或等于0，则自动播放将被禁用。
zh-CN.ownerPermission: 拥有全部权限，无法更改此权限。
zh-CN.adminPermission: 可以控制视频播放器并编辑用户权限。
zh-CN.editorPermission: 可以控制视频播放器的播放和暂停等操作。
zh-CN.newVersionUpdateConfirm: 有新的更新: v{0}，要更新吗？
zh-CN.onlyWorksOnVCCProject: 更新功能仅在VCC环境中有效。
zh-CN.importFromPlayer: 可以将USharpVideo、IwaSync3、VizVid或Kinel的播放列表拖动到此处进行导入
zh-CN.getPlaylistPleaseWhit: 请稍等，正在获取播放列表。
zh-CN.setUpLTCGIFailed: LTCGI自动设置失败，请检查LTCGI包是否损坏。
zh-CN.ltcgiSetOnOtherPlayer: LTCGI已设置在其他视频播放器上
zh-CN.clearLTCGISettings: 在此播放器上设置LTCGI将清除其他视频播放器上的LTCGI设置。
zh-CN.setUpAudioLinkFailed: Audio Link自动设置失败，请检查Audio Link包是否损坏。
zh-CN.updateYtdlpMessage: 要更新到最新版本的yt-dlp吗？
zh-CN.ytdlpNotAvailable: yt-dlp不可用。无法获取播放列表。
zh-CN.failedToSetExecutablePermissionsButDownl: 设置可执行文件权限失败，但下载完成。
zh-CN.failedToSetExecutablePermissions: 设置可执行文件权限失败。
zh-CN.exceptionOccurredWhileExtractingPlaylist: 提取播放列表时发生异常。

zh-TW.shouldEnableUIFirst: 需要顯示UI才能更改設定。

zh-TW.adminPermission: 可以控制影片播放器並編輯使用者權限。
zh-TW.editorPermission: 可以控制影片播放器的播放和暫停等操作。
zh-TW.newVersionUpdateConfirm: 有新的更新: v{0}，要更新嗎？
zh-TW.onlyWorksOnVCCProject: 更新功能僅在VCC環境中有效。

ko-KR.noUIController: 이 컨트롤러에는 UI가 포함되어 있지 않습니다.
ko-KR.shouldEnableUIFirst: UI 설정을 변경하려면 UI를 표시해야 합니다.
ko-KR.showIdleImage: 비디오가 재생되지 않을 때 이 이미지가 표시됩니다.
ko-KR.disableUIDistanceDesc: 빔이 일정 미터 이상으로 뻗어나가지 않도록 합니다.
ko-KR.title: 제목
ko-KR.disableSmallerThen0: 0 이하의 값이 지정되면 자동 재생이 비활성화됩니다.
ko-KR.ownerPermission: 전체 권한을 가지고 있으며, 이 권한은 변경할 수 없습니다.
ko-KR.adminPermission: 비디오 플레이어를 제어하고 사용자 권한을 편집할 수 있습니다.
ko-KR.editorPermission: 비디오 플레이어의 재생 및 일시 중지 등의 작업을 할 수 있습니다.
ko-KR.importFromPlayer: USharpVideo, IwaSync3, VizVid 또는 Kinel의 재생 목록을 여기에 드래그하여 가져올 수 있습니다.
ko-KR.getPlaylistPleaseWhit: 재생 목록을 가져오는 중입니다. 잠시 기다려 주세요.
ko-KR.setUpLTCGIFailed: LTCGI 자동 설정 실패, LTCGI 패키지가 손상되었는지 확인하십시오.
ko-KR.ltcgiSetOnOtherPlayer: LTCGI가 다른 비디오 플레이어에 설정되어 있습니다
ko-KR.clearLTCGISettings: 이 플레이어에 LTCGI를 설정하면 다른 비디오 플레이어의 LTCGI 설정이 지워집니다.
ko-KR.setUpAudioLinkFailed: Audio Link 자동 설정 실패, Audio Link 패키지가 손상되었는지 확인하십시오.
ko-KR.ytdlpNotAvailable: yt-dlp를 사용할 수 없습니다. 재생 목록을 가져올 수 없습니다.
ko-KR.failedToSetExecutablePermissionsButDownl: 실행 파일 권한 설정 실패, 다운로드 완료.
ko-KR.exceptionOccurredWhileExtractingPlaylist: 재생 목록 추출 중 예외 발생.

es-CL.noUIController: Este controlador no incluye una interfaz.
es-CL.shouldEnableUIFirst: Se necesita mostrar la interfaz para cambiar su configuración.
es-CL.showPlaylistUIAafterStart: Mostrar lista de reproducción después del inicio.
es-CL.showIdleImage: Esta imagen se mostrará cuando no haya video reproduciéndose.
es-CL.disableUIOnPickUpDesc: Desactiva la interacción con la interfaz al recoger.
es-CL.disableUIDistanceDesc: Evita que los rayos se extiendan más allá de cierta cantidad de metros.
es-CL.selectDefaultVideoPlayerType: Selecciona el motor del reproductor de video por defecto.
es-CL.title: Título
es-CL.autoPlayAfterSeconds: El video se reproducirá después de {0} segundos.
es-CL.mainTextureProperty: Nombre de Propiedad de Textura Principal
es-CL.playInRandomOrder: Las pistas se reproducirán en orden aleatorio.
es-CL.playTrackAfterSeconds: La siguiente pista se reproducirá después de {0} segundos.
es-CL.disableSmallerThen0: Si se especifica un valor de 0 o menos, la reproducción automática se desactivará.
es-CL.ownerPermission: Tiene permisos completos, este permiso no se puede cambiar.
es-CL.adminPermission: Puede controlar el reproductor de video y editar los permisos de los usuarios.
es-CL.editorPermission: Puede controlar el reproductor de video como reproducir y pausar.
es-CL.grantInstanceOwnerDesc: Concede permisos de propietario al propietario de la instancia.
es-CL.grantInstanceMasterDesc: Concede permisos de propietario al maestro de la instancia.
es-CL.autoUpdateToLatestVersion: Se actualizará automáticamente a la última versión.
es-CL.newVersionFound: Se ha encontrado una nueva actualización
es-CL.newVersionUpdateConfirm: Se ha encontrado una nueva actualización: v{0}, ¿deseas actualizar?
es-CL.noNewVersionFound: No se encontró una nueva actualización
es-CL.onlyWorksOnVCCProject: La función de actualización solo funciona en entornos VCC.
es-CL.importFromPlayer: Arrastra y suelta una lista de reproducción de USharpVideo, IwaSync3, VizVid o Kinel aquí para importar
es-CL.overwritePlaylistName: Sobrescribir Nombre de Lista de Reproducción
es-CL.getPlaylistPleaseWhit: Por favor espera mientras se obtiene la lista de reproducción.
es-CL.notSaved: Los cambios no se han guardado
es-CL.useLTCGIDesc: Usar LTCGI para este reproductor de video
es-CL.setUpLTCGIFailed: La configuración automática de LTCGI falló, por favor verifica si el paquete de LTCGI está dañado.
es-CL.ltcgiSetOnOtherPlayer: LTCGI está configurado en otro reproductor de video
es-CL.clearLTCGISettings: Configurar LTCGI en este reproductor borrará la configuración de LTCGI en otros reproductores de video.
es-CL.setUpAudioLinkFailed: La configuración automática de Audio Link falló, por favor verifica si el paquete de Audio Link está dañado.
